turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a white chocolate mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but please make it light with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the Starbucks on Horsham Road in Horsham, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a grande white chocolate mocha, with almond milk and light whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks at Horsham Road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help today.
